name: INA219
description: Micro:bit extension for interfacing with the INA219 sensor to measure voltage, current, and power using I2C.

initI2C.name: Initialize I2C
initI2C.tooltip: Initializes I2C communication with the INA219 sensor.

writeRegister.name: Write to Register
writeRegister.tooltip: Writes a 16-bit value to the INA219 register.

readBusVoltage.name: Read Bus Voltage
readBusVoltage.tooltip: Reads the bus voltage from the INA219 sensor.

readShuntVoltage.name: Read Shunt Voltage
readShuntVoltage.tooltip: Reads the shunt voltage from the INA219 sensor.

readCurrent.name: Read Current
readCurrent.tooltip: Reads the current from the INA219 sensor.

readPower.name: Read Power
readPower.tooltip: Reads the power from the INA219 sensor.
